events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like a refund because it is not what I paid for.
The issue was reviewed and categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back on incorrect item received.
The case has been assigned to the refunds department for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 12345678 and I've attached a clear photo of the wrong product received.
We have verified the details and will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this so promptly. I appreciate the quick resolution offer.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your account in a few days to confirm receipt.
Just following up to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Since your refund is complete and no further issues have been reported, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
